Name: Rocket Drift
About the game: Rocket Drift will have you launching your rocket and avoiding walls as you race towards the finish line. Grab the keys, unlock the locks, navigate the tight areas. Do what you must to get across the line as quick as possible. Gain stars for finishing levels and spend them in the in-game shop to buy new rocket skins and exhaust particles. Achieve better times to earn more stars! What to expect Easy to learn, hard to master controls. 25 levels ranging from easy to hard (very hard). Finish each level to unlock the next! Funky music for each new area. Full controller support. Unlockable rocket skins and exhaust particles! No micro-transactions! Timed levels. Discover the fastest way to complete each level! Fast restart button. You're going to need it. Level select menu. Return to previous levels to complete them faster. Steam Achievements! Fun for all ages!
